price: Onyankopͻn mmoa, Ͻde boa obi a Ͻpε, Ͻno na Otumi ade nyinaa yε, Mmͻborͻ-hunufoͻ Hene ne no.
arabic: بِنَصۡرِ ٱللَّهِۚ يَنصُرُ مَن يَشَآءُۖ وَهُوَ ٱلۡعَزِيزُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: binaṣri al-lahi yanṣuru man yashāu wahuwa al-ʿazīzu al-raḥīmu
